CartAbandonmentStartDay.title: Start Day
CartAbandonmentStartDay.description: Enter from when you want to send the cart reminder eg - if you enter 1 here we will send the cart reminders from yesterday to till end day

CartAbandonmentEndDay.title: End Day
CartAbandonmentEndDay.description: Enter till how many days ago you want to send the cart reminder eg - if you enter 2 here we will send the cart reminders from start day to 2 day ago

RemindUserAnonymous.title: Remind User Anonymous
RemindUserAnonymous.description: Enable This If you want to send notification to Anonymous user

RemindUserLogin.title: Remind Logins User
RemindUserLogin.description: Enable This If you want to send notification to login user

CartReminderEmailNotification.description: This notification sends email to customer to remind their abandon carts
